name: ARPB_TX_ALT_PAYER
description: This table extracts alternate payer routing information for PB transactions.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ALT_PAYER_COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The coverage that has been routed to the alternate payer.

columns.name: ALT_PAYER_PLAN_ID_BEN_PACKAGE_NAME
columns.description: *** Deprecated *** In table CLARITY_EPP_OT, the column BEN_PACKAGE_NAME (CMK .2) has been deprecated.  This column already exists as BENEFIT_PACKAGE_NM (CMK .2) in table CL_CMK. To look up the deprecated column's value after the Clarity Compass upgrade, join column CLARITY_EPP_OT.BEN_PACKAGE_ID to table CL_CMK column BENEFIT_PACKAGE_ID and get the BENEFIT_PACKAGE_NM value.   The name of the benefit package for this benefit plan.The ID of the benefit package is in the column BEN_PACKAGE_ID.
